author: Staff Reporter
text:
Wedding hall owners are mandated to get permission from the returning officer of the respective Assembly constituency before letting out the hall for weddings.

Non-political

According to the administration, wedding halls may be let out solely for conduct of weddings and other non-political functions.

However, the halls shall not be let out for annadhanams even so by private individuals, political gatherings, or meetings.

Consent

To ensure compliance, wedding halls shall be rented out only after receiving consent from the returning officer of the Assembly constituency.

Contact

The following are the returning officers for the respective constituencies who shall be contacted;

S.Valli, Special Sub-Collector, Palacode constituency (9445461734; 04342-234444); Mallika, Assistant Commissioner, Pennagaram constituency (9092885527; 04342- 230169); K.Ramamoorthy, Revenue Divisional Officer, Dharmapuri constituency (9445000428; 04342 - 260038); R.Kuppusamy, Special Sub- Collector, Paapireddypatty constituency (9445461766; 234444, 231692); R.Kavitha, RDO, Harur, Harur constituency (9486348684; 04346-221400).
title: ‘Get permission to let out wedding halls’
